categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Beheboth was a desert planet located in the Sanbra sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It was the homeworld of the Tirrith.
Beheboth was located at the end of an old offshoot of the Hydian Way. It was situated between Arbra and Golrath.

Beheboth was colonized by Bothans and Humans, who did not realize that the native Tirrith were sentient. Gideon Longspar enslaved some of the Tirrith, forcing the remainder to help him and his Brigands steal water from the local moisture farms. Luke Skywalker freed the Tirrith with the help of Darial Anglethorn, who later represented Beheboth in the New Republic Senate. Sand lice lived on the world. Thall Joben and the Davani family were native Behebothans.
